Apple today confirmed to Reuters that it has acquired Q.ai, an Israeli startup that is working on artificial intelligence technology for audio. Apple paid close to $2 billion for Q.ai, according to sources cited by the Financial Times. Apple recently updated its online store with a new ordering process for Macs, including the MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, iMac, Mac mini, Mac Studio, and Mac Pro. There used to be a handful of standard configurations available for each Mac, but now you must configure a Mac entirely from scratch on a feature-by-feature basis. results.title: Apple hosts Apple TV media event, here’s everything that’s been announced - 9to5Mac
results.content:
Go to the 9to5Mac home page

 Apple TV

# Apple hosts Apple TV media event, here’s everything that’s been announced

Ryan Christoffel | Feb 3 2026 - 12:01 pm PT

0 Comments

Apple is hosting a special media event today called the ‘2026 Apple TV Press Day.’ Here’s everything that’s been announced at the event so far.

## Apple unveils new original TV shows and movies coming soon

Today in Santa Monica, California, Apple is hosting a major invite-only media event focused on its streaming service.

In attendance are a variety of current and future Apple TV stars, such as Jon Hamm, Anya Taylor-Joy, Kurt Russell, Jennifer Garner, Keanu Reeves, James Marsden, and more.

‘2026 Apple TV Press Day’ has brought unveilings of several new original TV shows and movies.
